svg.text: Clonotyping performance. To test the performance of enclone, we combined data from 443 BCR libraries from 30 donors.
This yielded 381506 clonotypes, of which 9573 contained at least two cells each. Of these, 15 (0.16%) contained data
from multiple donors. These multi-donor clonotypes are errors. The fact that there are few of them suggests that the rate at
which enclone places unrelated cells in the same clonotype is low. This is a consequence of both the paired chain data
